clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in multiple sclerosis

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Laquinimod can be decreased when it is combined with Pitolisant
The metabolism of Laquinimod can be increased when combined with Metreleptin
The serum concentration of Laquinimod can be decreased when it is combined with Cenobamate
The serum concentration of Laquinimod can be increased when it is combined with Ritonavir
The serum concentration of Haloperidol can be increased when it is combined with Laquinimod
The metabolism of Tucatinib can be decreased when combined with Laquinimod
The serum concentration of Laquinimod can be increased when it is combined with Abametapir
The serum concentration of Laquinimod can be decreased when it is combined with Satralizumab
